attr.title: Pocket Crystal League
attr.desc: Pocket Crystal League (PCL) is a Poke-card game, although completely different to the Official TCG. The gameplay mechanics were partially inspired by Inscryption, being pretty straightforward and easy to learn.
attr.inst: Download the game from [itch.io](https://moodytail.itch.io/pocket-crystal-league) and add the `data.win` file to `ports/pocketcrystalleague`.
